data.text: @TheNationalsVic @OMGTheMess @EmmaKealyMP @theheraldsun What do you expect, look and listen to the way @DanielAndrewsMP treats women.
@3TMO @TheNationalsVic @stbayside @EmmaKealyMP @theheraldsun He HATES any woman who presents with an alternate narrative and his handmaidens in the Premiers Office are complicit.
@TheNationalsVic @stbayside @EmmaKealyMP @theheraldsun It’s clear that Andrews doesn’t like Victorian women OR kids.

.@EmmaKealyMP ➡️ "Govt has a responsibility to ensure every Victorian has the best chance to #RecoverRebuild - mentally, socially & economically"

"Targeted measures for women & girls to access mental health support now – not years down the track – is crucial" via @theheraldsun

In 2019, VIC gender pay gap at 9.6%

By May 2021, it had risen to 12.2% – the largest increase of anywhere in the nation

During the pandemic, VIC women lost their job at nearly 5x the rate of men

@EmmaKealyMP today calling for targeted measures to #RecoverRebuild
#IWD2022 #IWD
